title: Meduza (producers)
text:
Meduza (stylized as MEDUZA) is an Italian house music production group consisting of three members:  Luca de Gregorio, Mattia Vitale and Simone Giani. They are best known for their 2019 breakthrough songs "Piece of Your Heart", which was a collaboration with British production trio Goodboys and "Lose Control" which was also a collaboration with Goodboys and British singer Becky Hill. "Piece of Your Heart" reached number two on the UK Singles Chart upon release, and was nominated for the Grammy Award for Best Dance Recording.
On November 11, 2020, Meduza performed a live set in Cava dei Balestrieri in San Marino. The performance was streamed on Twitch, in conjunction with Live Nation and the Fuser video game.
